tr.td:
If thegen_serverprocess is
registered through an alternative
process registry

div.div: Timeoutspecifies how many milliseconds to wait for a reply, or the atom infinity to wait indefinitely
Fromis a tuple {Pid, Tag}, where Pid is the pid of the client and Tag is a unique tag
Stateis the internal state of the gen_server process

div.span: continues executing with the possibly updated internal state

div.div: waiting for the next message to arrive

tr.td:
Replyis given back toFromas the
return value ofgen_server:call/2,3.The gen_server process then calls
Module:terminate(Reason,NewState)
and terminates

td.div:
The gen_server process then calls
Module:terminate(Reason,NewState)
and terminates
